StyleCategoryDef.label: Saxhleel Traditional Buildings
StyleCategoryDef.description: Traditional Saxhleel architecture featuring organic curves that mirror the natural flow of rivers and root systems. Buildings incorporate living Hist wood, raised foundations for marsh conditions, and water integration.

StyleCategoryDef.label: An-Xileel Militant Buildings
StyleCategoryDef.description: Fortified An-Xileel architecture emphasizing defensive capabilities with camouflaged exteriors, hidden entrances, reinforced structures, and integration with natural marsh defenses for guerrilla warfare.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Shadowscale Hidden Buildings
StyleCategoryDef.description: Secretive Shadowscale architecture designed to blend seamlessly with surroundings, featuring concealed entrances, false walls, underground passages, and minimal exterior decoration to avoid detection.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Hist Keeper Sacred Buildings
StyleCategoryDef.description: Sacred Hist Keeper architecture centered around living tree integration, featuring root-woven walls, Hist sap lighting, organic geometry reflecting natural growth patterns, and spiritual sanctuaries.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Thornscale Warrior Buildings
StyleCategoryDef.description: Martial Thornscale architecture featuring intimidating designs with defensive spikes, war totems, trophy displays, and robust construction meant to project strength and fierce reputation.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Glade Runner Scout Buildings
StyleCategoryDef.description: Practical Glade Runner architecture emphasizing mobility and observation, featuring elevated platforms, lightweight construction, camouflaged exteriors, and quick-assembly temporary structures.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Root-Whisper Ancient Buildings
StyleCategoryDef.description: Ancient Root-Whisper architecture preserving the oldest Argonian building traditions, featuring primitive but sophisticated techniques, natural materials only, and designs unchanged for millennia.
